name: Frontline Drone Combat: Birds-Eye of Arena Supremacy. Play Modern Gunship Mission Game
name_original: Frontline Drone Combat: Birds-Eye of Arena Supremacy. Play Modern Gunship Mission Game
description:
Control Your Plane from Remote location and start war with enemy.

Controls:

Swipe on left screen to fly the plane and touch on right part of screen to use fire power.
You can also change weapons.
you can switch between device tilt based controlling or touch based controls.
